channel.title: Olds on 幸福胖胖

Good morning. 早晨好 An hour ago, I resigned as State's Attorney of Cook County. 一小时前 我正式请辞库克郡地方检察官 I did this with a heavy heart 我心情沉重 and a deep commitment to fight these scurrilous charges. 誓要驳斥这些无端的指控 I want to be clear. 我需要澄清事实 I have never abused my office.

An hour ago, I resigned as state's attorney of cook county. 一小时前 我正式请辞库克郡地方检察官 Are you still involved with prostitutes, sir? 请问你是否曾招妓? Thanks for playing the breadwinner for a while. It's not gonna last forever. 谢谢你暂时养家糊口 我不会让你苦一辈子的 I just wanted to say thank you for the opportunity.

Previously onThe Good Wife... {\i1}傲骨贤妻 前情回顾: And hour ago I resigned As state's attorney of cook county. 一小时前 我正式请辞库克郡地方检察官 I want to be clear... I have never abused my office. 我需要澄清事实 我从未滥用职权 At the same time, I need to atone for 这些指控为我家人带来的伤害 我追悔莫及 my personal failings with my wife Alicia and our two children.

Previously on The Good Wife... {\i1}傲骨贤妻 前情提要 An hour ago, I resigneg the State's Attorney Cook County 一小时前 我正式请辞库克郡地方检察官 I want to be clear. 我需要澄清事实 I have never abused my office. 我从未滥用职权 Alicia, Alicia 我知道你很不容易 I know this has been hard on you, but you have to believe me.

Previously on The Good Wife... {\i1}傲骨贤妻 前情提要 An hour ago I resigned the State's Attorney of Cook County. 一小时前 我正式请辞库克郡地方检察官 - Dad told us he made mistakes. - Yeah, but not that. 爸爸说他犯了错 Who first told you of your husband's infidelity, Mrs. Florrick? 是的 但不是这种错 CNBC.

Previously on The Good Wife: {\i1}傲骨贤妻 前情提要 I understand the need to blame someone for your husband's downfall, 你把丈夫的垮台归咎于别人 这我能理解 but I didn't release that sex tape to hurt you or your family. 但我没有泄露色情录像带 来伤害你或你的家人 You should know, I was holding back. 你应该知道 我克制住了 Mr.

It's nothing. 没什么 What do you mean, it's nothing? Look at them. 什么意思 没什么? 看看他们 I am looking at them. 我正在看他们 是财务会议 It's a financial meeting. That's how they look in a financial meeting. 看起来他们在开财务会议 No, that's how they look when they're cutting jobs.
{\i1}傲骨贤妻 前情提要 你想让我在保释的时候作证? 我们需要你对法官表现出 你们关系安全稳定 他回家是受欢迎的 老爸说他干了错事 但不是...那个 Peter Florrick接下来要做什么呢? 在接下来的几个星期我要上庭 争取胜诉 Bail is hereby denied. This court is adjourned. 拒绝保释 Peter didn't make bail.

Simple assault. 一般伤害罪 Six months' detention, 拘留6个月 缓刑3年 - three years' probation. - Two years' probation, no jail time. 缓刑2年 不用坐牢 You do know it's called bargaining, right? 你知道这是在谈判 对吧? 为什么只有我在让步? Why am I the only one making concessions? I gave you an extra year on probation.

Previously... {\i1}傲骨贤妻 前情提要 The State has recently received evidence 地方检察官有证据可以证明 that the defendant has attempted to interfere with the judicial process. 被告曾试图干扰司法程序 Bail is hereby denied. 因此驳回保释请求 I thought I'd be leaving with you. It's a betrayal. 我本以为可以跟你回家的 Maybe it's from Mom's work.

{\i1}傲骨贤妻 前情提要 You are a freshman in high school. You had a junior in your room yesterday Zach 你才14岁 刚刚升入高中 with the door closed. The computer stays here. 昨天就跟一个高二女生呆在房里 房门紧锁 电脑就放在这儿 Those envelopes on your doorstep are just the beginning.
Previously on The Good Wife {\i1}傲骨贤妻 前情提要 - Glenn - Peter You put me in with the general population? 你指使人把我转到普通牢房的 是吧? 没错 Madison小姐 Do you recognize this man? Prior to your relationship 你认识这名男子吗?
- How many telephones are there? - Two. 一共有几部电话? 两部 That's the only exit? 这是唯一的出口吗? 没错 There's no contraband in the apartment? 家里也没有任何违禁物? That's correct. 那当然 - Any firearms?

Previously on The Good Wife. {\i1}傲骨贤妻 前情提要 - Do we tell mom? - They sent them to Mom 要不要告诉妈妈? to hurt her, 他们送这些来就是为了伤害她 所以还是别说了 so I say no. You, Mr. Florrick, Florrick先生 我批准案件重申 have been granted a retrial.

Dr. Princefield to emergency. 紧急呼叫Crispill医生 Dr. Princefield to emergency. 紧急呼叫Crispill医生 This is a delaying tactic. It's... 法官大人 这是拖延战术 这是... She was just contacted this morning. That's not a delaying tactic, 今天早上才联系到她 这不是拖延战术 - That's a simple procedural.

Previously on The Good Wife {\i1}傲骨贤妻 前情提要 Sorry about that, Mr...? - 对不起 您叫...? - McVeigh - McVeigh. - My goodness, what an unfortunate name. 天呐 多不幸的名字 Hopefully no relation? {\a6}(McVeigh是一位臭名昭著的杀人犯) 但愿没什么关系 I've offended you?

Previously... {\i1}傲骨贤妻 前情提要 The transmitter is to be worn around your ankle at all times. 发射器要一直绑在脚踝处 You're confined here 24 hours a day. 全天的活动只限于在公寓内进行 It must not cross this line. 不能跨过这条线 - Your condition is your... - There is no condition!

He's coming in today, I heard. 他今天会过来 反正我是这么听说的 Lockhart, Gardner. One second. 这里是L&G律师事务所 请稍等 Margie said he's coming in for a divorce settlement. Margie说他今天会来处理 离婚和解的事儿 I thought he was dead. Agos & Florrick. 我还以为他死了 She's on the other line. Agos & Florrick 抱歉 她的电话在另一条线上 好的 - What's Chrissy doing?

Good job, Alicia. Thanks for going all out this year. It's been 谢谢你今年的所有付出 我们已经走过相当一段路 - quite a ride. - We're not out of the woods yet. 但还没有到头 还有很多事情要做 We have a lot of trimming to do. - 所以我们必须更努力地工作 - 要做到事半功倍 - We'll have to work harder.

No hello? - 连招呼也不打? - 你好 This is all just an elaborate plan to get me alone, isn't it? 为了让我独身一人 这一切都是你们精心策划的对吧? You found me out. 被你发现了 - We're redoing the floors. - It's her. - 我们在重新铺地面 - 是她 You'll have to turn off cell phones and beepers.

td { border-style:solid; border-width:1px; text-align:center; width:30px; height:30px; background-color:#cccccc; } .focus { background-color:#888888; } .solved { background-color:#3E50B4; color:#FFFFFF; } 使用说明: 选中对应的格子 键盘上按1-9输入对应的数字,按0清空 输入完毕后按"求解"按钮输出答案 按"重来"可以再来一局 重来 求解 var Puzzle = (function () { function Puzzle() { this.N = 9; this.COL = this.N * this.N * 4; this.ROW = this.N * this.N * this.N; this.data = []; this.solution = []; this._init_col = []; this.
